Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Removes eligibility or receipt of primary social security disability benefits as a condition for ordinary disability retirement for certain members
Summary: Removes eligibility or receipt of primary social security disability benefits as a condition for ordinary disability retirement for New York city enhanced plan members in active service who are not eligible for a normal retirement benefit and have completed five years or more of service.
LawCode: Amd ยง506, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to removing eligibility or receipt of primary social security disability benefits as a condition for ordinary disability retirement for certain members
